meanings.sent1: He wore the spivviest outfit at the party, with flashy colors and shiny shoes.
meanings.sent2: The man in the spivviest suit stood out among the crowd with his extravagant style.
meanings.sent3: The spivviest dresser in town always manages to turn heads with his bold fashion choices.
meanings.sent4: Her spivviest hat was like a beacon in the sea of ordinary headwear.
meanings.sent5: The spivviest car on the street gleamed under the sunlight, drawing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: spivviest: most characteristic of a spivvy person
meanings.sent1: His spivviest behavior included slick talking and always looking for a quick deal.
meanings.sent2: She had the spivviest attitude, always trying to charm her way out of trouble.
meanings.sent3: The spivviest character in the movie was both annoying and oddly charming.
meanings.sent4: The spivviest salesman could sell ice to an Eskimo with his smooth words.
meanings.sent5: In the spivviest manner, he tried to convince everyone that his scheme was foolproof.
